DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Effect Sildenafil Clitoral Engorgement Measured Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) Pre-Menopausal Women With Female Sexual Arousal Disorder
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal woman age 1845 primary diagnosis Female Sexual Arousal Disorder least 6 month prior enter study . The FSAD could associate female orgasmic disorder ( FOD ) and/or superficial introital dyspareunia . Subjects hypoactive sexual desire disorder . Subjects use acceptable mean contraception duration study . Subjects prescribe and/or take medication contraindicate cautioned concomitant intake sildenafil .
